thread.title: Alice
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Alice

author: Alice
title: Alice
text:
I bought a jacket from Country attire just after Christmas. The item arrived within 2 days but was a little too small. I purchased a larger size which again was delivered within 2 days and then returned the original item - receiving a full refund within 3 days.
Excellent service, will definitely use this website again.
